Sentencas: Chemically-homogeneous and well-characterized ceramic powders have been used for the preparation and investigation of the SOFC components.
Titulo: Synthesis, Forming and Characterization of Ceramic Materials for the Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The powders were synthesized by spray drying and subsequent calcination.
Titulo: Synthesis, Forming and Characterization of Ceramic Materials for the Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: The resulting powders were characterized with regard to the crystalline phases, chemical analysis, specific surface area, particle size and particle size distribution, morphology and particle agglomerates.
Titulo: Synthesis, Forming and Characterization of Ceramic Materials for the Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: These parameters are very important for forming thin, flat ceramic sheets and components by tape-casting and screen-printing technology.
Titulo: Synthesis, Forming and Characterization of Ceramic Materials for the Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)

Sentencas: Forming process, sintering, electrical conductivity and compatibility are discussed.
Titulo: Synthesis, Forming and Characterization of Ceramic Materials for the Planar Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC)
